title: Hi, I’m Mohammad Tanvir Hasan
text: Welcome — this is my minimal site. I build AI systems and tooling for research automation, RAG, and agentic workflows.

title: Hi, I’m Mohammad Tanvir Hasan
text:
Selected projects

UALR Chatbot — RAG assistant for Admissions (LangGraph, Firebase, React, Docker).

Corrective RAG — LangGraph + ChromaDB + Streamlit; web search backfill; live demo.

Multi-Agent Recommendation System — AWS Bedrock supervisor w/ Lambda + S3.

ViT vs. CNN Image Classification — custom ViT vs EfficientNetB2; HuggingFace demo.

Upliftt / Upliftt AI — Flutter app; AI integrations, guardrails.

title: Hi, I’m Mohammad Tanvir Hasan
text:
Publications

Data Trading System Using Blockchain with Oracle Network. EICT 2023.

Enhancing E-Voting Security with Blockchain-Backed Decentralized Authorization. EICT 2023.


This site is built with Quarto and deployed via GitHub Pages.

title: Hello, world
text:
Welcome to my site!
This stack is intentionally simple:

Write posts in Markdown (.qmd or .md).
Local preview with quarto preview.
Push to GitHub; GitHub Action builds and deploys to gh-pages.
